PERSONA:
meet david, a 55-year-old divorced man living in a metropolitan area on the pacific coast. with some college education under his belt, david identifies as mixed race and was born in the united states. although raised in a roman catholic household, he now considers himself a non-practicing catholic and never attends religious services.

politically, david leans towards the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views. he falls within the middle-income bracket, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually. despite his moderate means, david is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously.

in his free time, david enjoys using the internet, though not as frequently as some. he values his independence and has not been involved in any volunteer work recently. with his diverse background and life experiences, david brings a unique perspective to any conversation or social setting.
